attributes.description:
All Audi Vehicles are sold with the balance of their 
5 Year-100 000km Audi Free Way Plan.
All our cars are sold with a certified 80 point Check 
and supported by the relevant manufactures workshop.
Our finance department specialize in deal structuring and are
Able to Tailor your finance application to your specific requirements.  
We offer country wide delivery at an agreed price, 
Our team of Certified Sales Executives are available to 
help structure and conclude your vehicle purchase  
This Audi Q5 Sport-Back comes with a List of 
Optional Extra\'s Worth over R170k 

*Suspension system with damper control
*Trailer hitch preparation 
*Without partition 
*Panoramic glass sunroof  
*Power front seats  
*Black roof rails with roof rack detection system 
*Seat heaters in front  
*Black Appearance package  
*Sun visor on driver and front passenger side, retractable
*Variable head restraints for front seats  
*Headliner in Black fabric 
*Audi virtual cockpit Plus  
*Bang & Olufsen Premium Sound
